name: Cono
description: The 4th war has begun and as a member of the Cono clan it is your duty to protect the land of ratom.  The gorzum are attacking citys and villages.  They are murdering everyone nearbye. The gorzum are stronger than ever before because they are supported by the skeleton clan, Mredo.  Go out into the outer region of ratom, the north mountains, and defeat Prox, one of the Gorzum warlords. now go out htere and FIGHT!
